title: A Caribbean Mystery
description: This is an alternate cover edition for ISBN 0006164358Miss Jane Marple holidays at Caribbean hotel, bought by dark Tim Kendal 30s and blonde wife Molly 20s, who has paranoia and blackouts. Garrulous Major Palgrave dies of rumored heart trouble, blood pressure pills found, but not the photo of a killer he started to show Jane. Maid Victoria is stabbed. Jane, helped by rich Mr Rafiel, is justice 'Nemesis'.
author: Agatha Christie
